welcome_message_body: "Welcome to beautiful Eppingen! Nestled in the picturesque landscapes of Germany, this charming city is known for its historical architecture and captivating culture. We invite you to discover and indulge in all that Eppingen has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Heidelberg Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. No password is required.
